headers.value: default-src 'self'; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com; script-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://s.ytimg.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; img-src 'self' data: https://i.ytimg.com https://s.ytimg.com; media-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://*.googlevideo.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://s.ytimg.com https://i.ytimg.com https://*.googlevideo.com; worker-src 'self' blob:; child-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com;
